languages.text: "Еще одна система без звезды?" {n}Голос дознавателя дрожит от гнева, затем слышится глубокий вдох.{/n} "Необходимо узнать, не обосновались ли ксеносы на замерзшем мире, и если да — уничтожить. Если считаете иначе, позвольте напомнить: протекторат одного из Вольных Торговцев Простора официально лишился миллиардов подданных. Можете ли вы быть уверены, что подобное не повторится с Даргонусом? Или любым другим вашим миром?"

traits.locale_text: "Еще одна система без звезды?" {n}Голос дознавателя дрожит от гнева, затем слышится глубокий вдох.{/n} "Необходимо узнать, не обосновались ли ксеносы на замерзшем мире, и если да — уничтожить. Если считаете иначе, позвольте напомнить: протекторат одного из Вольных Торговцев Простора официально лишился миллиардов подданных. Можете ли вы быть уверены, что подобное не повторится с Даргонусом? Или любым другим вашим миром?"

languages.text: "Another system is missing its star?" {n}You hear a quiver of outrage in Heinrix's voice, followed by a deep exhale.{/n} "We need to see if there are xenos on that frozen world and, should our suspicions be confirmed, exterminate them. If you disagree, let me remind you that the protectorate of one of the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse has lost several billions of its subjects. Can you be certain that the same won't happen to Dargonus? Or another of your worlds?"
languages.original_text: "Еще одна система без звезды?" {n}Голос дознавателя дрожит от гнева, затем слышится глубокий вдох.{/n} "Необходимо узнать, не обосновались ли ксеносы на замерзшем мире, и если да — уничтожить. Если считаете иначе, позвольте напомнить: протекторат одного из Вольных Торговцев Простора официально лишился миллиардов подданных. Можете ли вы быть уверены, что подобное не повторится с Даргонусом? Или любым другим вашим миром?"

traits.locale_text: "Another system is missing its star?" {n}You hear a quiver of outraged anger in Heinrix's voice, followed by a deep exhale.{/n} "We need to see if there are xenos on that frozen world and, should our suspicions be confirmed, exterminate them. If you disagree, let me remind you that the protectorate of one of the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse lost several billions of its subjects. Can you be certain that the same won't happen to Dargonus? Or another of your worlds?"

"Another system lost its star and we learn about this only now?" {n}The interrogator's voice trembles with anger, then a deep exhale is heard.{/n} "{name}, we need to find out what happened here. If you think otherwise, let me remind you — your trade empire just lost billions of servants. Who knows what star system will be next."

If you disagree, let me remind you that the protectorate of one of the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse lost several billions of its subjects. Can you be certain that the same won't happen to Dargonus? Or another of your worlds?"

If you disagree, let me remind you that the protectorate of one of the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse has lost several billions of its subjects. Can you be certain that the same won't happen to Dargonus? Or another of your worlds?"

"Another system is missing its star?" {n}You hear a quiver of outrage in Heinrix's voice, followed by a deep exhale.{/n} "We need to see if there are xenos on that frozen world and, should our suspicions be confirmed, exterminate them. If you disagree, let me remind you that the protectorate of one of the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse has lost several billions of its subjects. Can you be certain that the same won't happen to Dargonus? Or another of your worlds?"

languages.text: « Encore un système dépossédé de son étoile ? » {n}La voix tremblant d'indignation, Heinrix marque une pause, puis inspire profondément avant de reprendre.{/n} « Nous soupçonnons la présence de xénos sur cette planète gelée ; si cela se confirme, notre devoir est de les exterminer. Au cas où vous ne seriez pas d'accord, je vous rappellerai simplement que le protectorat d'un autre libre-marchand des Étendues de Koronus a perdu plusieurs milliards de ses sujets. Comment garantir que Dargonus ne subira pas le même sort ? Ou un autre des mondes qui dépendent de vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Another system is missing its star?" {n}You hear a quiver of outrage in Heinrix's voice, followed by a deep exhale.{/n} "We need to see if there are xenos on that frozen world and, should our suspicions be confirmed, exterminate them. If you disagree, let me remind you that the protectorate of one of the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse has lost several billions of its subjects. Can you be certain that the same won't happen to Dargonus? Or another of your worlds?"

traits.locale_text: « Encore un système dépossédé de son étoile ? » {n}La voix tremblant d'indignation, Heinrix marque une pause, puis inspire profondément avant de reprendre.{/n} « Nous soupçonnons la présence de xénos sur cette planète gelée ; si cela se confirme, notre devoir est de les exterminer. Au cas où vous ne seriez pas d'accord, je vous rappellerai simplement que le protectorat d'un autre libre-marchand des Étendues de Koronus a perdu plusieurs milliards de ses sujets. Comment garantir que Dargonus ne subira pas le même sort ? Ou un autre des mondes qui dépendent de vous ? »

languages.text: “又有一个星系失去了恒星？”{n}海因里希的声音里带着愤怒的颤抖。紧接着，他深深地呼了口气。{/n}“我们要去看看那个冰封世界有没有异形。如果怀疑得到证实，我们需要彻底消灭那些家伙。如果你不同意，请允许我提醒你，科罗努斯扩区其中一位的行商浪人的王朝已经损失了几十亿名臣民。你能保证达戈努斯，或是你的其他世界，不会遭遇同样的命运吗？”
languages.original_text: "Another system is missing its star?" {n}You hear a quiver of outrage in Heinrix's voice, followed by a deep exhale.{/n} "We need to see if there are xenos on that frozen world and, should our suspicions be confirmed, exterminate them. If you disagree, let me remind you that the protectorate of one of the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse has lost several billions of its subjects. Can you be certain that the same won't happen to Dargonus? Or another of your worlds?"

traits.locale_text: “又有一个星系失去了恒星？”{n}海因里希的声音里带着愤怒的颤抖。紧接着，他深深地呼了口气。{/n}“我们要去看看那个冰封世界有没有异形。如果怀疑得到证实，我们需要彻底消灭那些家伙。如果你不同意，请允许我提醒你，科罗努斯扩区其中一位的行商浪人的王朝已经损失了几十亿名臣民。你能保证达戈努斯，或是你的其他世界，不会遭遇同样的命运吗？”

languages.text: "Es fehlt noch einem anderen System der Stern?" {n}Heinrix' Stimme zittert vor Entrüstung, dann atmet er tief aus.{/n} "Wir müssen sehen, ob es auf dieser gefrorenen Welt Xenos gibt. Und sollte sich unser Verdacht bestätigen, müssen wir sie auslöschen. Wenn Ihr das anders seht, lasst mich Euch daran erinnern, dass das Protektorat eines der Freihändler der Koronus-Ausdehnung mehrere Milliarden seiner Untertanen verloren hat. Könnt Ihr sicher sein, dass das Dargonus nicht auch geschieht? Oder einer anderen Eurer Welten?"
languages.original_text: "Another system is missing its star?" {n}You hear a quiver of outrage in Heinrix's voice, followed by a deep exhale.{/n} "We need to see if there are xenos on that frozen world and, should our suspicions be confirmed, exterminate them. If you disagree, let me remind you that the protectorate of one of the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse has lost several billions of its subjects. Can you be certain that the same won't happen to Dargonus? Or another of your worlds?"

traits.locale_text: "Es fehlt noch einem anderen System der Stern?" {n}Heinrix' Stimme zittert vor Entrüstung, dann atmet er tief aus.{/n} "Wir müssen sehen, ob es auf dieser gefrorenen Welt Xenos gibt. Und sollte sich unser Verdacht bestätigen, müssen wir sie auslöschen. Wenn Ihr das anders seht, lasst mich Euch daran erinnern, dass das Protektorat eines der Freihändler der Koronus-Ausdehnung mehrere Milliarden seiner Untertanen verloren hat. Könnt Ihr sicher sein, dass das Dargonus nicht auch geschieht? Oder einer anderen Eurer Welten?"

languages.text: «¿Otro sistema sin estrella?». {n}Escuchas un temblor de indignación en la voz de Heinrix, seguido de una profunda exhalación.{/n} «Tenemos que comprobar si hay xenos en ese mundo helado y, si confirmamos nuestras sospechas, eliminarlos. Si no está de acuerdo con esto, debo recordarle que el protectorado de un Comerciante Independiente de la Extensión de Koronus ha perdido millones de súbditos. ¿No cree que a Dargonus podría pasarle lo mismo? ¿O a otro de sus mundos?».
languages.original_text: "Another system is missing its star?" {n}You hear a quiver of outrage in Heinrix's voice, followed by a deep exhale.{/n} "We need to see if there are xenos on that frozen world and, should our suspicions be confirmed, exterminate them. If you disagree, let me remind you that the protectorate of one of the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse has lost several billions of its subjects. Can you be certain that the same won't happen to Dargonus? Or another of your worlds?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Otro sistema sin estrella?». {n}Escuchas un temblor de indignación en la voz de Heinrix, seguido de una profunda exhalación.{/n} «Tenemos que comprobar si hay xenos en ese mundo helado y, si confirmamos nuestras sospechas, eliminarlos. Si no está de acuerdo con esto, debo recordarle que el protectorado de un Comerciante Independiente de la Extensión de Koronus ha perdido millones de súbditos. ¿No cree que a Dargonus podría pasarle lo mismo? ¿O a otro de sus mundos?».

languages.text: 「また星系で星が消えただと？」{n}ハインリックスの声は怒りで震え、続いて深いため息が聞こえた。{/n}「あの凍った惑星に異種族がいるのか確認しなければいけない。その疑いがある場合は、奴らを始末しないとな。この件に意義があるなら、とあるコロヌス・エクスパンスの自由開拓者の保護領で数十億人の臣民を失ったことに改めて言及しようか。同じことがダルゴナスにも起こらないと言えるか？君の別の惑星でも起らないと？」
languages.original_text: "Another system is missing its star?" {n}You hear a quiver of outrage in Heinrix's voice, followed by a deep exhale.{/n} "We need to see if there are xenos on that frozen world and, should our suspicions be confirmed, exterminate them. If you disagree, let me remind you that the protectorate of one of the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse has lost several billions of its subjects. Can you be certain that the same won't happen to Dargonus? Or another of your worlds?"

traits.locale_text: 「また星系で星が消えただと？」{n}ハインリックスの声は怒りで震え、続いて深いため息が聞こえた。{/n}「あの凍った惑星に異種族がいるのか確認しなければいけない。その疑いがある場合は、奴らを始末しないとな。この件に意義があるなら、とあるコロヌス・エクスパンスの自由開拓者の保護領で数十億人の臣民を失ったことに改めて言及しようか。同じことがダルゴナスにも起こらないと言えるか？君の別の惑星でも起らないと？」

languages.text: "Yıldızını kaybetmiş bir sistem daha mı?" {n}Heinrix'in sesinin öfkeyle titrediği duyuyorsun. Ardından derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "O donuk dünyada zeno olup olmadığına bakmalıyız ve şüphelerimiz tasdik edilirse onları yok etmeliyiz. Bu söylediklerime katılmıyorsan sana Koronus Enginliği'ndeki Hür Tacirlerden birinin, protektorasındaki birkaç milyar tebaasını kaybettiğini hatırlatmama izin ver. Aynısının Dargonus'un veya bir başka dünyanın başına gelmeyeceğini garanti edebilir misin?"
languages.original_text: "Another system is missing its star?" {n}You hear a quiver of outrage in Heinrix's voice, followed by a deep exhale.{/n} "We need to see if there are xenos on that frozen world and, should our suspicions be confirmed, exterminate them. If you disagree, let me remind you that the protectorate of one of the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse has lost several billions of its subjects. Can you be certain that the same won't happen to Dargonus? Or another of your worlds?"
